name: Feather Fall
description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If a creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no damage from the fall, and the spell ends for that creature.

castingTime.reactionCondition: when you or a creature you can see within 60 feet falls

combatCost.condition: when you or a creature you can see within 60 feet falls

components.materialDescription: a small feather or piece of down

effects.description: Targeted falling creatures descend at 60 feet per round and take no fall damage if they land before the spell ends.
